00023 #include "util/BaseEngine.h"
00024 #include "util/Engines.h"
00025 #include "util/LogStream.h"
00026 #include "util/PgOptions.h"
00027 #include "util/Util.h"

00034 #ifndef WIN32

00123 using namespace std;
00124 
00126 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00127   ofstream logOut;
00128   LogStream log;
00129   string logName;
00130   bool closeLog = false;
00131     
00132   try {
00133   const string version ("NON-OFFICIAL-RELEASE");
00134   const string cvsId ("$Id: apt-engine-wrapper.cpp,v 1.24.2.1 2009/10/13 14:18:52 awilli Exp $");
00135   const string versionToReport = version + "-" + cvsId;
00136 
00137   /* Parse options. */
00138   PgOptions opts;
00139   opts.setUsage("apt-engine-wrapper - Generic wrapper around the engine\n"
00140                 "factory. You probably want to use one of the engine\n"
00141                 "specific wrappers. Use ' -- ' to separate wrapper args\n"
00142                 "from engine args.\n\n"
00143                 "usage:\n"
00144                 "   apt-engine-wrapper --help \n"
00145                 "   apt-engine-wrapper --engine ProbesetSummarizeEngine --help \n"
00146                 "   apt-engine-wrapper --engine ProbesetSummarizeEngine -- \\\n"
00147                 "     --cdf-file=... \n\n");
00148   opts.defineOption("", "engine", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00149                     "The engine to run.",
00150                     "");
00151   opts.defineOption("", "log-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00152                     "The file to write out log items to.",
00153                     "");
00154   opts.defineOption("h", "help", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00155                     "This message.",
00156                     "false");
00157   opts.defineOption("", "version", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00158                     "Display version information.",
00159                     "false");
00160   opts.defineOption("", "verbose", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00161                     "Verbosity Level.",
00162                     "1");
00163 
00164   int argvPos = opts.parseArgv(argv);
00165   const string progName = Util::fileRoot(opts.getProgName());
00166 
00167   // does the user want the version 
00168   if(opts.getBool("version")) {
00169     cout << "version: " << versionToReport << endl;
00170     exit(0);
00171   }
00172   // Do we need help? (I know I do...)
00173   else if(opts.getBool("help") || argc == 1) {
00174     set<string> toHide;
00175     opts.usage(toHide, true);
00176 
00177     if(opts.get("engine")!= "") {
00178         BaseEngine *engine = EngineReg::CreateEngine(opts.get("engine"));
00179         if(engine == NULL)
00180             Err::errAbort("Unable to create engine named '"+opts.get("engine")+"'");
00181         engine->optionUsage(toHide, true);
00182     } else {
00183         list<string> engineNames = EngineReg::GetEngineNames();
00184         cout << endl << "Available Engines:" << endl;
00185         for(list<string>::iterator iter = engineNames.begin(); iter != engineNames.end(); iter++) {
00186             cout << "   " << *iter << endl;
00187         }
00188     }
00189     cout << endl << "version: " << versionToReport << endl;
00190     exit(0);
00191   }
00192   else if(opts.get("engine")!= "") {
00193         BaseEngine *engine = EngineReg::CreateEngine(opts.get("engine"));
00194         if(engine == NULL)
00195             Err::errAbort("Unable to create engine named '"+opts.get("engine")+"'");
00196 
00197         /* Set up the logging and message handlers. */
00198         Verbose::setLevel(opts.getInt("verbose"));
00199         if(opts.get("log-file") != "") {
00200             string logName = opts.get("log-file");
00201             Util::mustOpenToWrite(logOut, logName.c_str());
00202             log.setStream(&logOut);
00203             Verbose::pushMsgHandler(&log);
00204             Verbose::pushProgressHandler(&log);
00205             Verbose::pushWarnHandler(&log);
00206             closeLog = true;
00207         }
00208 
00209         engine->parseArgv(argv,argvPos+1);
00210 
00211         engine->run();
00212   }
00213   } 
00214   catch(...) {
00215       Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00216       // Close log files
00217       if(closeLog) {
00218           logOut.close();
00219       }
00220       return 1;
00221   }
00222   // Close log files
00223   if(closeLog) {
00224      logOut.close();
00225   }
00226 
00227   return 0;
00228 }
